trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref uid="langword_csharp_group" name="group" href=""></xref> element with <xref uid="langword_csharp_ref" name="ref" href=""></xref> attribute from the XML Schema as specified by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C).
trans-unit.target: Representa o <xref uid="langword_csharp_group" name="group" href=""> </xref> elemento com <xref uid="langword_csharp_ref" name="ref" href=""> </xref> atributo do esquema XML, tal como especificado pelo Consortium a World Wide Web (W3C).

trans-unit.source: This class is used within complex types that reference a <xref uid="langword_csharp_group" name="group" href=""></xref> defined at the <xref uid="langword_csharp_schema" name="schema" href=""></xref> level.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe é utilizada em tipos complexos que referenciam um <xref uid="langword_csharp_group" name="group" href=""> </xref> definido no <xref uid="langword_csharp_schema" name="schema" href=""> </xref> nível.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaGroupRef"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaGroupRef"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets one of the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaChoice"></xref>, <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAll"></xref>, or <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSequence"></xref> classes, which holds the post-compilation value of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Particle" name="Particle" href=""></xref> property.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um do <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaChoice"> </xref>, <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAll"> </xref>, ou <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSequence"> </xref> classes, que contém o valor de pós-compilação do <xref uid="langword_csharp_Particle" name="Particle" href=""> </xref> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The post-compilation value of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Particle" name="Particle" href=""></xref> property, which is one of the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaChoice"></xref>, <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAll"></xref>, or <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSequence"></xref> classes.
trans-unit.target: O valor de pós-compilação do <xref uid="langword_csharp_Particle" name="Particle" href=""> </xref> propriedade, o que é um do <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaChoice"> </xref>, <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAll"> </xref>, ou <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSequence"> </xref> classes.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of a group defined in this schema (or another schema indicated by the specified namespace).
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome de um grupo definido neste esquema (ou outra esquema indicado pelo espaço de nomes especificado).

trans-unit.source: The `RefName` value must be a QName.
trans-unit.target: O `RefName` valor tem de ser um QName.

trans-unit.source: The `RefName` can include a namespace prefix.
trans-unit.target: O `RefName` pode incluir um prefixo de espaço de nomes.

trans-unit.source: To include a group in a `complexType` element, use the `RefName` attribute to specify the group to include in this schema.
trans-unit.target: Para incluir um grupo de um `complexType` elemento, utilize o `RefName` atributo para especificar o grupo de modo a incluir neste esquema.

trans-unit.source: The name of a group defined in this schema.
trans-unit.target: O nome de um grupo definido neste esquema.
